title: Ranked SoloQ's taking too long?
body:
Hello, 

Gold V Annie main here.

Few things, one of them being. Queues for Ranked is taking exceptionally long.

If I was to choose mid/top, it would take me roughly 12 minutes to find ONE accept/decline match. What's going on? Are players quitting or? 

I can understand when they went to play the rotating gamemode, the weekend would literally have no players. 

Then there are the non-English speaking players... Most games I get players that use boxes to type, I understand it's a different language and I don't have the software on my PC to read it, I can't find ways to communicate with my team most games and that just ruins it for me. It feels like I'm playing Single player. 

Anyone know what's going on or what I could do? D:

replies.body: soz dude i dont really know how to make solo "faster" but i know a way that at least makes urlife easier, find a friend and play with them in ranked. i know that it will at least the roles will get filled up quicker. {{champion:1}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:1}}
